about.p1: I'm programmer, specializing in Front-end development. I live and study in Minsk. And I am eager to find a great job :)
about.p2: I'm fond of resolving some interesting problems, creating a visual part of application, working with interfaces and self development. Therefore, in future, when I get a huge experience in Front-end, I wish to learn adjacent vectors of web development.
about.p3: I've got about 1 year of work experience in Innowise Group, where I've been working on several Pet-projects and one internal project. This project was CV-generator for employees of company that included employees list, CV list, page with entities, generator pdf file of resume and, of course, authorization.
about.p4: Outside the work, I am a huge fan of cooking. One of my signature dishes is cheesecake. Also I'm studying on Faculty of Applied Mathematic and Computer Science with mathematics as a major.
